title: Firework
author: Katy Perry
lyrics:
[00:08.43] Do you ever feel like a plastic bag
[00:12.45] Drifting through the wind, wanting to start again?
[00:16.16] Do you ever feel, feel so paper-thin
[00:19.99] Like a house of cards, one blow from caving in?
[00:23.99] Do you ever feel already buried deep
[00:27.71] Six feet under? Screams, but no one seems to hear a thing
[00:31.80] Do you know that there's still a chance for you?
[00:35.37] 'Cause there's a spark in you
[00:37.65] You just gotta ignite the light
[00:42.50] And let it shine
[00:46.20] Just own the night
[00:49.94] Like the Fourth of July
[00:53.20] 'Cause baby, you're a firework
[00:57.47] Come on, show 'em what you're worth
[01:01.29] Make 'em go, "Aw! Aw! Aw!"
[01:04.67] As you shoot across the sky
[01:09.10] Baby, you're a firework
[01:12.75] Come on, let your colors burst
[01:16.71] Make 'em go, "Aw! Aw! Aw!"
[01:19.82] You're gonna leave them all in awe, awe, awe
[01:25.90] You don't have to feel like a wasted space
[01:29.81] You're original, cannot be replaced
[01:33.73] If you only knew what the future holds
[01:37.31] After a hurricane comes a rainbow
[01:41.13] Maybe a reason why all the doors are closed
[01:45.05] So you could open one that leads you to the perfect road
[01:49.10] Like a lightning bolt, your heart will glow
[01:52.82] And when it's time, you'll know
[01:55.02] You just gotta ignite the light
[01:59.85] And let it shine
[02:03.62] Just own the night
[02:07.36] Like the Fourth of July
[02:10.61] 'Cause baby, you're a firework
[02:14.79] Come on, show 'em what you're worth
[02:18.66] Make 'em go, "Aw! Aw! Aw!"
[02:22.18] As you shoot across the sky
[02:26.39] Baby, you're a firework
[02:30.25] Come on, let your colors burst
[02:34.15] Make 'em go, "Aw! Aw! Aw!"
[02:37.34] You're gonna leave them all in awe, awe, awe
[02:42.85] Boom, boom, boom
[02:45.34] Even brighter than the moon, moon, moon
[02:48.79] It's always been inside of you, you, you
[02:52.84] And now it's time to let it through
[02:57.12] 'Cause baby, you're a firework
[03:01.28] Come on, show 'em what you're worth
[03:05.22] Make 'em go, "Aw! Aw! Aw!"
[03:08.42] As you shoot across the sky
[03:12.85] Baby, you're a firework
[03:16.66] Come on, let your colors burst
[03:20.38] Make 'em go, "Aw! Aw! Aw!"
[03:23.90] You're gonna leave them all in awe, awe, awe
[03:29.29] Boom, boom, boom
[03:31.73] Even brighter than the moon, moon, moon
[03:37.02] Boom, boom, boom
[03:39.39] Even brighter than the moon, moon, moon
[03:42.43]
